name: packwiz-spec
description: A format for specifying Minecraft modpacks, designed to be easy to manipulate with tools.

scripts.build: typescript-json-schema typings.d.ts Pack --strictNullChecks --aliasRefs -o schemas/pack.json --required && typescript-json-schema typings.d.ts Index --strictNullChecks --aliasRefs -o schemas/index.json --required && typescript-json-schema typings.d.ts Mod --strictNullChecks --aliasRefs -o schemas/mod.json --required

author: comp500
